A second letter to Father Lewis Sabran, Jesuite in answer to his reply. Gee, Edward, 1657-1730.
16 p.
Printed for Henry Mortlock ..., London : 1688.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, new York. Attributed to Edward Gee. cf. NUC pre-1956. Advertisement: p. 16.
